custom_nodes.author: #NOTICE_1.13
custom_nodes.title: NOTICE: This channel is not the default channel.
custom_nodes.description:
If you see this message, your ComfyUI-Manager is outdated.
Recent channel provides only the list of the latest nodes. If you want to find the complete node list, please go to the Default channel.
Making LoRA has never been easier!

custom_nodes.author: Jerome Bacquet
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI XenoFlow
custom_nodes.description: Implementation of Instance nodes, Replicate nodes, and standard Save UI to improve the workflow into ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.title: Jovi_Colorizer
custom_nodes.description: Colorize ComfyUI nodes with defaults per node, node category or via regex filtering.

custom_nodes.author: Metal3d

custom_nodes.description: A set of photo effects for ComfyUI, for the moment, only Bleach Bypass effect is provided, but more to come!

custom_nodes.title: IF_DatasetMkr
custom_nodes.description: Create Video datasets staright from YT or a video file path

custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI extension for video-based prompting and processing with support for various models and video processing capabilities

custom_nodes.author: impactframes
custom_nodes.title: IF_LLM
custom_nodes.description:
Run Local and API LLMs, Features Conditioning manipulation via Omost, supports Ollama, LlamaCPP LMstudio, Koboldcpp, TextGen, Transformers or via APIs Anthropic, Groq, OpenAI, Google Gemini, Mistral, xAI and create your own charcters assistants (SystemPrompts) with custom presets and muchmore
[w/It Might comflict with IF_AI_tools so if you have it installed please remove it before installing IF_LLM I am working on adding this tools to IF_AI_tools so you only need one or the other]

custom_nodes.title: comfyui-missing-tool
custom_nodes.description:
NODES: TrimBG, TrimBG Advanced, Image Queue Loader, Load Image Alpha.
A few tools for ComfyUI, perhaps it's exactly what you need.

custom_nodes.author: illuminatianon
custom_nodes.title: CSV Wildcard Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that provides dynamic text substitution using wildcards and CSV files. Perfect for creating varied prompts with consistent relationships between terms.

custom_nodes.author: GeekyGhost
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Geeky-Kokoro-TTS
custom_nodes.description: A powerful and feature-rich custom node collection for ComfyUI that integrates the Kokoro TTS (Text-to-Speech) system with advanced voice modification capabilities. This package allows you to generate natural-sounding speech and apply various voice effects within ComfyUI workflows.

custom_nodes.author: billwuhao
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_KokoroTTS_MW
custom_nodes.description: A Text To Speech node using Kokoro TTS in ComfyUI. Supports 8 languages and 150 voices

custom_nodes.description: The latest DIT architecture-based image generation model from Zhipu that supports Chinese text generation.

custom_nodes.author: marcoc2
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Cog
custom_nodes.description:
This is a custom node aiming to run CogView4 on diffusers while there is no official implementation on ComfyUI.
NOTE: You will need a updated version of diffusers and I don't know if updating it my break other stuff, so I advise you to make in a new instance of ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: kijai
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-HFRemoteVae
custom_nodes.description: This node allows using Hugginface remote server for latent decoding. Currently supported models: SD, SDXL, Flux, HunyuanVideo

custom_nodes.author: JohanK66
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI WebhookImage
custom_nodes.description: This package provides a custom node to ComfyUI to send a message and image by means of a webhook

custom_nodes.author: huimengshiguang
custom_nodes.title: AspectAwareTiling
custom_nodes.description: This is an extension script for Stable Diffusion WebUI, modified based on the original functionality. It now supports fixing FLUX panorama seams. It allows users to independently configure seamless image tiling for both the X and Y axes while also being capable of handling FLUX panorama seam issues.

custom_nodes.author: Yuan-ManX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PhotoDoodle
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for PhotoDoodle model.

custom_nodes.author: JiSenHua
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TD
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI designed to facilitate the real-time transmission of rendered images, videos, or 3D models to TouchDesigner.

custom_nodes.author: Slickytail
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-RegionalAdaptiveSampling
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI implementation of Regional Adaptive Sampling, (original implementation at https://github.com/microsoft/RAS).

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WanVideoKsampler
custom_nodes.description: An advanced custom node for ComfyUI that provides optimized access to Wan2.1, a state-of-the-art video foundation model suite. The WanVideoKsampler node features intelligent memory management to enable higher resolution outputs and longer video sequences, even on consumer-grade hardware.

custom_nodes.author: fluffydiveX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-hvBlockswap
custom_nodes.description: It is a simple HunyuanVideo block swap node for ComfyUI native nodes.

custom_nodes.author: blepping
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ApplyResAdapterUnet
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI node to apply the ResAdapter Unet patch for SD1.5 models

custom_nodes.author: RiceRound
custom_nodes.title: RiceRound Cloud Node
custom_nodes.description: This is an imaginative project that allows for one-click deployment, providing both an online page and a ComfyUI cloud node.[w/This custom node is vulnerable because it can dynamically download and execute nodes.]

custom_nodes.author: Taremin
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-prompt-config
custom_nodes.description:
This is a custom node for ComfyUI.
The PromptGenerationConfig node allows users to configure settings such as image dimensions, step count, and CFGScale through prompts during image generation.
The PromptEdit node enables users to add text from the prompt to the negative prompt (or vice versa) and replace parts of the prompt using regular expressions.

custom_nodes.author: InceptionsAI
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-RunComfy-Helper
custom_nodes.description: Helper nodes for [a/RunComfy](https://www.runcomfy.com)

custom_nodes.author: zichongc
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Attention-Distillation
custom_nodes.description:
Non-native [a/AttentionDistillation](https://github.com/xugao97/AttentionDistillation) for ComfyUI.
Official ComfyUI demo for the paper AttentionDistillation, implemented as an extension of ComfyUI. Note that this extension incorporates AttentionDistillation using diffusers.

custom_nodes.author: maximclouser
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-InferenceTimeScaling
custom_nodes.description: Inference-time techniques to enhance diffusion-based image generation quality through random search and zero-order optimization algorithms

custom_nodes.author: smthemex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_PhotoDoodle
custom_nodes.description: PhotoDoodle: Learning Artistic Image Editing from Few-Shot Pairwise Data，you can use it in comfyUI

custom_nodes.author: duhaifeng
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MaskEditor-Extension
custom_nodes.description: This repository packages the latest BiRefNet model as a ComfyUI node for use, supporting chunked loading on both CPU and GPU, as well as model caching features.

custom_nodes.author: PanicTitan
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Fooocus-V2-Expansion
custom_nodes.description:
Adaptation of Fooocus Prompt Expansion for ComfyUI
Forked from [a/ComfyUI-Prompt-Expansion](https://github.com/meap158/ComfyUI-Prompt-Expansion) with some updates and changes based on original Fooocus, to be more specific [a/expansion.py](https://github.com/lllyasviel/Fooocus/blob/main/extras/expansion.py) and [a/LykosAI - GPT-Prompt-Expansion-Fooocus-v2](https://huggingface.co/LykosAI/GPT-Prompt-Expansion-Fooocus-v2)

custom_nodes.author: moose-lab
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-GPT
custom_nodes.description: Help comfy deisgner develope custom nodes by foreground GUI without any coding knowledge, complementing the workflow what you design with LLM automatically

custom_nodes.author: shinich39
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-model-metadata
custom_nodes.description: Print model metadata on note node

custom_nodes.author: leeguandong
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI nodes to use AttentionMask
custom_nodes.description: The attention mask in the T5 part of flux and SD3 utilizes the text-side attention mask to make the model focus more on text embeddings during image generation, thereby enhancing semantic alignment with the text.

custom_nodes.author: marawan206
custom_nodes.title: Face Cropper Node (2:3 Ratio)
custom_nodes.description: The Face Cropper Node (MarwanFaceCropping) is a custom image processing node designed for ComfyUI. It takes an input image and crops it to a 2:3 aspect ratio, ensuring that most of the subject remains in the frame while maintaining the correct proportions.

custom_nodes.author: Easymode-ai
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-BPT
custom_nodes.description: Comfyui [a/BPT](https://github.com/whaohan/bpt) Wrapper (Trimesh in/out connections)

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FreeVC_wrapper
custom_nodes.description: A voice conversion extension node for ComfyUI based on [a/FreeVC](https://github.com/OlaWod/FreeVC), enabling high-quality voice conversion capabilities within the ComfyUI framework.

custom_nodes.author: fat-tire
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Unified Media Suite
custom_nodes.description: Lightweight [a/PyAV](https://pypi.org/project/av/)-powered ComfyUI nodes to load/save multimedia.

custom_nodes.author: leeguandong
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI nodes to use FluxClipWeight
custom_nodes.description: In Flux, the T5 and CLIP in the text branch are weighted separately to regulate the strength of text-side embeddings.

custom_nodes.author: SirWillance
custom_nodes.title: Force of Will Suite Light
custom_nodes.description: Beginner-friendly nodes for prompt refinement in ComfyUI, including custom nodes for weighting, splitting, combining, catalogues, and the PromptRefiner for a simple prompt interface. For more info, join me on https://www.twitch.tv/sirwillance. Be one of the first 50 followers to get a FREE upgrade to the Standard Tier!

custom_nodes.author: KAVVATARE
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Light-N-Color
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI node that adds Brightness, RGB channels, and Depth of Field to AI-generated image

custom_nodes.author: ajbergh
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-ethnicity_hairstyle_clip_encoder
custom_nodes.description: This ComfyUI custom node enhances the standard CLIP text encoding functionality by integrating ethnicity and hairstyle selection into the positive prompt. Designed to work seamlessly with ComfyUI, this node allows you to influence the conditioning process by dynamically appending descriptive modifiers. Users can choose a specific ethnicity or hairstyle, or opt for a 'random' selection that picks an option from a predefined CSV list.

custom_nodes.author: RodrigoSKohl
custom_nodes.title: Interior Design for Comfyui
custom_nodes.description: This node is based on MykolaL/StableDesign

custom_nodes.author: orange90
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Regex-Runner
custom_nodes.description: This is a node to run regex for strings.

custom_nodes.author: smthemex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_YuE
custom_nodes.description: [a/YuE](https://github.com/multimodal-art-projection/YuE) is a groundbreaking series of open-source foundation models designed for music generation, specifically for transforming lyrics into full songs (lyrics2song). you can use it in comfyUI

custom_nodes.author: benda1989
custom_nodes.title: GKK·Sonic
custom_nodes.description: a plugin of ComfyUI for Long Sonic

custom_nodes.author: ainewsto
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui_Comfly
custom_nodes.description: NODES: Comfly_Mj, Comfly_mjstyle, Comfly_upload, Comfly_Mju, Comfly_Mjv, Comfly_kling_videoPreview

custom_nodes.author: svetozarov
custom_nodes.title: AS_GeminiCaptioning Node
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI node that combines an image with simple text parameters to create a prompt, sends it to the Google Gemini API via the google-generativeai SDK, and returns the generated text response along with the original prompt and an execution log

custom_nodes.author: Pablerdo

custom_nodes.description: Cut and and drag that allows you to cut and drag multiple images on a path

custom_nodes.author: LAOGOU-666
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LG_HotReload
custom_nodes.description: An extension for ComfyUI that allows hot reloading. Once installed, you can preview changes in real-time while developing custom nodes or installing plugins without restarting ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: fairy-root
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Show-Text
custom_nodes.description: A simple but powerful node for ComfyUI that displays text input in a readable format. Perfect for viewing outputs from text generation nodes, prompt builders, interrogators, and more.

custom_nodes.author: Taremin
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-keep-multiple-tabs
custom_nodes.description: This is an extension for ComfyUI. It retains multiple workflow tabs so that they are not lost when reloading or restarting.

custom_nodes.author: Shiba-2-shiba

custom_nodes.description: This is a custom node to add timestep for FreeU V2.

custom_nodes.description: StringOps is a versatile text processing toolkit built for ComfyUI's node-based workflows

custom_nodes.description: generate tags / prompt from danboru image_id input

custom_nodes.description: Light-A-Video: Training-free Video Relighting via Progressive Light Fusion,you can use it in comfyUI
